description: Guff sailed the seas as an opportunistic merchant until a looming mutiny lead him to trade his ship for a castle. As maintaining is tiresome work, he hired some exiles to do his bidding. With his now growing landlocked domicile he intends to slowly expand his influence until he owns everything.
taunt_1: No disrespect, but you gotta die now!
taunt_3: Please, don't look for a minute...
nervous_2: Oh come on, don't do that to me.
victory_1: piss off, and don't come back.
victory_3: Never doubted... for a second ... that I could do it...
ally_death: I think I'm about to loose my head, better take care of yours!
extra: I'm hungry. Wanna go grab a bite?
no_help_2: Look in the mirror and ask again!
no_sent: I would if i could, but that's mine.
team_losing: You think it's to late to swap sides?
